dict.acceptation: 很少地；罕有地；极精彩地；珍奇地，绝佳地；

sent.orig: Rarely, very rarely, the master would admit defeat.
sent.trans: 那位大师竟也承认失败，难得啊，很难得啊。

sent.orig: Because such assets are traded rarely, they change price rarely as well.
sent.trans: 非流动资产很少进行交易，因此价格也很少变动。

sent.orig: He says Shanghai word rarely, also say to others oneself are Shanghai person rarely.
sent.trans: 他很少说上海话，也很少对别人说自己是上海人。

sent.orig: Although I rarely feel I need to a wetsuit for warmth.
sent.trans: 然而我很少感到自己需要湿式保暖衣来保暖。

sent.orig: Nowadays, TV plays are rarely worth watching.
sent.trans: 眼下值得一看的电视剧很少。
